duties_responsibilities.duty: Support high-priority Operations Support Services project and program work from beginning to end
Measure, monitor, analyze, and report on data in support of work efforts
Participate in idea generation activities and overall design/development of programs and processes applicable to work efforts
Create and implement work plans and complete requirements needed to deliver on the work
Complete required supporting documentation for work efforts
Identify roadblocks and risks and recommend appropriate resolutions

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree (BA, BS) in a related field
